extracted_playbook.title: Review Detailed Advisory for Each Vulnerability
extracted_playbook.description: Review the detailed advisory for each vulnerability to understand the specific risks and mitigation steps.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Security Updates
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the security updates provided by Microsoft to protect systems against potential exploitation of the vulnerabilities.
